refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A gtk.PrintSettings object represents the settings of a print dialog in a system-independent way. The main use for this object is that once you've printed you can get a settings object that represents the settings the user chose, and the next time you print you can pass that object in so that the user doesn't have to re-set all his settings.

Its also possible to enumerate the settings so that you can easily save the settings for the next time your app runs, or even store them in a document. The predefined keys try to use shared values as much as possible so that moving such a document between systems still works.
Printing support was added in GTK+ 2.10.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings

note.para: This constructor is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Creates a new gtk.PrintSettings object.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.copy

listitem.simpara: a newly allocated copy of the print settings

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns a copy of this gtk.PrintSettings object.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.has_key

listitem.simpara: True, if key has a value

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns True, if a value is associated with key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Looks up the string value associated with key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Associates value with key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.unset

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Removes any value associated with key. This has the same effect as setting the value to None.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.foreach

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Calls func for each key-value pair.
The signature of func is:
where key and value are the key-value pair and data is user_data.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_bool

listitem.simpara: True, if key maps to a true value.

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the boolean represented by the value that is associated with key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_bool

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets key to the boolean value specified by value..

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_double

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the double value associated with key, or 0.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_double_with_default

listitem.simpara: the floating point number associated with key

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the floating point number represented by the value that is associated with key, or def if the value does not represent a floating point number.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_double

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets key to the given double value.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_length

listitem.simpara: the unit of the return value
the length value of key, converted to unit

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value associated with key, interpreted as a length. The returned value is converted to the units specified by unit.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_length

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Associates a length in units of unit with key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_int

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the integer value of key, or 0.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_int_with_default

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of key, interpreted as an integer, or the default value specified by def.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_int

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets key to the given integer value.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_printer

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Convenience method to obtain the value of the "printer" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_printer

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Convenience function to set the "printer" key the value specified by printer.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_orientation

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Get the value of the "orientation" key, converted to one of the .

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_orientation

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "orientation" key to one of the specified by orientation.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_paper_size

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of the "paper-format" key, converted to a gtk.PaperSize.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_paper_size

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "paper-format", "paper-width" and "paper-height" keys using the gtk.PaperSize specified by paper_size.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_paper_width

listitem.simpara: the unit for the return value
the paper width, in units of unit

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Retuens the value of the "printer-width" key converted to the units specified by unit.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_paper_width

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "printer-width" key using the units specified by unit.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_paper_height

listitem.simpara: the units for the return value
the paper height, in units of unit

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Gets the value of the "paper-height" key converted to the units specified by unit.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_paper_height

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "paper-height" key using the units specified by unit.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_use_color

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "use-color" key. If True color will be used when printing.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_use_color

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "use-color" key to the value specified by use_color. If use_color is True color will be used when printing.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_collate

listitem.simpara: True if the printed pages are to be collated

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "collate" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_collate

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "collate" key. If collate is True the output pages will be collated.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_reverse

listitem.simpara: True if the order of the printed pages shoudl be reversed.

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "reverse" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_reverse

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "reverse" key. If reverse is True the output pages willl be reversed.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_duplex

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "duplex" key - one of the .

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_duplex

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "duplex" key. duplexp must be one of the

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_quality

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "quality" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_quality

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "quality" key. quality must be one of the .

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_n_copies

listitem.simpara: the number of copies to print

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "n-copies" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_n_copies

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "n-copies" key to the value specified by num_copies.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_number_up

listitem.simpara: the number of pages per sheet

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "number-up" key which specifies the number of pages per sheet.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_number_up

listitem.simpara: the number of pages per sheet

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "number-up" key. number_up specifies the number of document pages to be printed per sheet.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_resolution

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "resolution" key in dpi.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_resolution

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "resolution" key in dpi.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_scale

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "scale" key as a float number.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_scale

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "scale" key using the float number specified by scale.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_print_pages

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "print-pages" key as one if the .

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_print_pages

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "print-pages" key to one of the .

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_page_ranges

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "page-ranges" key as a list of 2-tuples containing the start and end page numbers of each range.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_page_ranges

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "page-ranges" key to the value of page_ranges which should be a sequence of 2-tuples containing the start and end page numbers of each page range.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_page_set

listitem.simpara: the set of pages to print

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "page-set" key which is one of the .

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_page_set

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "page-set" key to the value specified by page_set which should be one of the .

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_default_source

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "default-source" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_default_source

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "default-source" key to the string specified by default_source.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_media_type

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "media-type" key.
The set of media types is defined in PWG 5101.1-2002 PWG.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_media_type

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "media-type" key.
The set of media types is defined in PWG 5101.1-2002 PWG.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_dither

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "dither" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_dither

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "dither" key to the string specified by dither.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_finishings

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "finishings" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_finishings

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "finishings" key to the string specified by finishings.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_output_bin

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Returns the value of the "output-bin" key.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_output_bin

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.10 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of the "output-bin" key to the value specified by output_bin.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.to_file

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.12 and above.

refsect2.para: This function saves the print settings from settings to file_name.

listitem.simpara: layout of page in number-up mode.

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.16 and above.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_number_up_layout

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.16 and above.

refsect2.para: Sets the value of GtkNumberUpLayout.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.load_file

listitem.simpara: the filename to read the settings from.

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.16 and above.

refsect2.para: Reads the print settings from file_name. See gtk.PrintSettings.to_file.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_resolution_x

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.16 and above.

refsect2.para: The get_resolution_x() method gets the value of gtk.PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION_X.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_resolution_y

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.16 and above.

refsect2.para: The get_resolution_y() method gets the value of gtk.PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION_Y.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_resolution_xy

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.16 and above.

refsect2.para: The set_resolution_xy() method sets the values of gtk.PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION, gtk.PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION_X and gtk.PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION_Y.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.get_printer_lpi

listitem.simpara: the resolution in lpi (lines per inch).

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.16 and above.

refsect2.para: The get_printer_lpi() method gets the value of gtk.PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER_LPI.

refsect2.title: gtk.PrintSettings.set_printer_lpi

listitem.simpara: the resolution in lpi (lines per inch).

note.para: This method is available in PyGTK 2.16 and above.

refsect2.para: The set_printer_lpi() method sets the value of gtk.PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER_LPI.

refsect2.title: gtk.print_settings_new_from_file

listitem.simpara: the filename to read the settings from.

note.para: This function is available in PyGTK 2.12 and above.

refsect2.para: Reads the print settings from filename. Returns a new gtk.PrintSettings object with the restored settings, or None if an error occurred. See gtk.PrintSettings.to_file().
